channel.title: I Tryed adding effects of bonenecks into server but they dont seem to work right

item.title: I Tryed adding effects of bonenecks into server but they dont seem to work right
item.dc:creator: @R_u_skeptical R_u_skeptical
item.description:
@R_u_skeptical wrote:

i Tryed adding effects of bonenecks into server but they dont seem to work right
i keep getting the same xp with or without the neck

public void boneNecklaces(int id) { int[][] bones = { {526, 528, 530}, {532, 534, 6812}, {536, 4834, 18830} }; for (int i = 0; i < bones.length; i++) switch (playerEquipment[playerAmulet]) { case 19886: //Twisted bird skull necklace if (bones[i][i] == id) playerLevel[5] += 2; break; case 19887: //Split dragontooth necklace if (bones[1][i] == id || bones[2][i] == id) playerLevel[5] += 3; else if (bones[0][i] == id) playerLevel[5] += 2; break; case 19888: //Demon horn necklace if (bones[2][i] == id) playerLevel[5] += 4; else if (bones[1][i] == id) playerLevel[5] += 3; else if (bones[0][i] == id) playerLevel[5] += 2; break; } }

is there a way that i just do
if(player.equipment = 19887)
gives double or triple prayer xp?

Read full topic
item.source: I Tryed adding effects of bonenecks into server but they dont seem to work right
